channel.title: Stuff.co.nz - Stuff
channel.description: Top Stories from Stuff.co.nz. New Zealand, world, sport, business & entertainment news on Stuff.co.nz.

item.title: Covid-19 live: Auckland to move to alert level 3, rest of country stays in level 2
item.description: The city will move down alert level at 11.59pm on Tuesday for at least two weeks, while the rest of NZ stays in level 2, and a part of Waikato with three recent cases will have a "bespoke" set of temporary rules.
item.dc:creator: Stuff

item.title: Covid-19 NZ: Auckland will move to alert level 3 at 11.59pm Tuesday for at least two weeks
item.description: Jacinda Ardern says "long hard tail" of Delta has been tough, but level 3 will be able to contain it.
item.dc:creator: HENRY COOKE

item.title: Covid-19: The dos and do nots at alert level 3
item.description: It has been more than a year since those outside Auckland have been at alert level 3. Here's a reminder of what you can and can't do.
item.dc:creator: MARIN&EACUTE; LOURENS

item.title: Covid-19: What travel is allowed at alert level 3?
item.description: Aucklanders are allowed limited travel within their region — here's what's permitted.
item.dc:creator: BROOK SABIN

item.title: Retailers in Thames-Coromandel fear they'll be connected to latest Covid cases
item.description: Shoppers visting Thames would have travelled from towns now at the centre of an investigation into confirmed Covid-19 cases.
item.dc:creator: LAWRENCE GULLERY

item.title: Covid-19 outbreak situation report: What happened today, September 20
item.description: There were 22 new Delta cases reported on the day Auckland's alert level change was confirmed, and a 'bespoke' alert level for part of Waikato was announced.
item.dc:creator: Stuff

item.title: South Canterbury retain Strachan Trophy with win over Buller in Heartland opener
item.description: South Canterbury won the Strachan Trophy for the third straight time in cruising past Buller 48-13 in round one of the Heartland rugby championship.
item.dc:creator: SHOURABH VITTALMURTHY

item.title: Covid-19: What you need to know about Auckland moving to alert level 3
item.description: Masks in high schools and a stay-at-home plea for over 65s who aren’t unvaccinated are all part of a new-look alert level 3 for Auckland.
item.dc:creator: ADAM JACOBSON

item.title: UFC 266: Kiwi fighter Dan Hooker gets dramatic eleventh-hour US visa, fights Saturday in Las Vegas
item.description: Last-ditch US visa approval means Kiwi UFC star will be fighting in the octagon just 48 hours after arriving in Las Vegas.
item.dc:creator: MAT KERMEEN

item.title: Bluff Hill Motupōhue Environment Trust expands network
item.description: The Bluff Hill Motupōhue Environment Trust has flourished through support from the local community for 13 years, but now new funding has allowed them to expand operations across Bluff Hill in the hopes of achieving a predator free environment by 2050.
item.dc:creator: LAURA HOOPER

item.title: Childhood vaccination catch-up targets Manawatū Māori
item.description: Extra clinics are being set up to ensure vaccination against childhood illnesses.
item.dc:creator: JANINE RANKIN

item.title: Arrests made after reports of daylight brawl in South Taranaki
item.description: Police said three men, aged 47, 43, and 52, had been arrested.
item.dc:creator: TARA SHASKEY

item.title: Developers get 300 applications from first-home buyers for 41 townhouses
item.description: Being drawn out of a ballot for a $650,000 home is a "dream come true" for 47-year-old Ariana McCahill.
item.dc:creator: MATTHEW TSO

item.title: Conviction for man who called his ex two minutes after protection order issued
item.description: The police served him a protection order. Two minutes later, he called his partner and threatened her.
item.dc:creator: AMY RIDOUT

item.title: All Blacks vs Springboks: Brodie Retallick unveils recipe to roll the world champs
item.description: All Blacks lock has never lost to South Africa, and aims to keep it that way on Saturday.
item.dc:creator: MARC HINTON

item.title: Hampers given to South Canterbury frontline workers in appreciation of their work
item.description: After a tough couple of months, a surprise delivery of gift baskets to police in Timaru on Monday was “a bit overwhelming’’, a spokesperson says.
item.dc:creator: KEILLER MACDUFF

item.title: Commerce Commission charges against Bunnings dismissed
item.description: Court says 'lowest prices' claims were taglines and shoppers would not have expected Bunnings to have checked every price.
item.dc:creator: SUSAN EDMUNDS

item.title: Ariki throw weight behind push for Māori to get vaccinated, to protect their whakapapa
item.description: “Now is the time when we must consider how we protect ourselves, our whānau, our whakapapa and everything about te iwi Māori.”
item.dc:creator: MAXINE JACOBS

item.title: Staying at level 2 labelled 'frustrating' for South Island
item.description: News that the South Island will remain at level 2 has frustrated the chief executive of South Canterbury's Chamber of Commerce.
item.dc:creator: CHRIS TOBIN

item.title: Controversial recycling contract back on table for Invercargill City Council
item.description: The Invercargill City Council's contract to sort the city's kerbside recycling ends on December 31 but Southland disAbility Enterprises is the frontrunner to retain the job.
item.dc:creator: LOGAN SAVORY
